records.summary: Red Chevron shaped light floating South with long light trails behind it
records.story: Red Chevron shaped light floating South with long light trails behind it I went onto our deck, which over looks the Pacific Ocean, and something in the starry night sky caught my eye, it was so startling I yelled to my partner to come quick.  It was a large red light moving quickly with long light trails behind it, then it vanished and then came back for a second and was gone.  It lasted less than a minute.  However it was already floating proud when I had come outside and noticed it.  Amazing. ((NUFORC Note:  Missile launch from Vandenberg AFB at 21:24 hrs. (Pacific).  PD))

records.summary: The formataion in the sky, color of lights the design the were making and the orange buest when they disappeated.
records.story: The formataion in the sky, color of lights the design the were making and the orange buest when they disappeated. I just went out side to smoke a ciggertt and my parents jus pulled up in the driveway and was saying do u see that in the sky, I said yeah the moon is bright, they saod no look over here and look up, all I can say was wow and those r ufo.s, it wad abput ten in the sky and they formed a straight line togetjer nice and neat line and wad still for a second then they mved in to a square f(rm in the sky, light were rptatinf a round then rhey made a rectangel design and as the wer forming that the orher ones staryed to leav# and disappet with a orngange color burst of colors shooting straightup in the sky then they all dis appeared.  Me paremts said there was ten other people down the street pointing at the sky last night , all is whay I can say and what is going on

records.summary: I saw a very bright stationary light that was maybe 1.5 miles away. Since it was near a military air station I looked for running light
records.story: I saw a very bright stationary light that was maybe 1.5 miles away.  Since it was near a military air station I looked for running lights or movement on the object but nothing was seen.  Then it suddenly shot towards the ground at a very high rate of speed.

records.summary: 2 round or sphere shaped objects floating then both disappearing from view at the same time
records.story: 2 round or sphere shaped objects floating then both disappearing from view at the same time I observed 2 objects high in the sky Possibly thousands of feet up. I seen 2 silvery objects They looked round in shape, floating in the sky. They moved like objects being carried on the current. Another parent who was picking up their child also seen the objects and suggested they were newspapers. However this cant be the case because of the distance that they appeared up in the atmosphere. I thought they might be huge pieces of plastic. I am not saying they were spaceships, I am saying that they were mysterious they were not identifiable and both disappeared from view at the same moment.  Also there were military planes flying at this time and I observed some com trails in the same area as the mysterious objects.

records.summary: Object was glowing red and green and was hard to identify the shape. First it fell like a shooting star, then it began to jig jag...
records.story: Object was glowing red and green and was hard to identify the shape.  First it fell like a shooting star, then it began to jig jag... I was standing outside with two friends atop a higher hilly region a few miles off of Del Mar Heights Road in the Del Mar area of San Diego (more inland about 5-7 miles East of the 5 Freeway).  We had all just finished admiring the panoramic view and the various skylines when something drew my eyes back to that part of the sky. All of a sudden, I saw what appeared to be a very low shooting star way off in the distance. It is hard to decipher where it was exactly in San Diego, as it seemed to be over 10 - 20 miles south / southeast of where we were. Immediately, I told the others and they watched what initially appeared to be a shooting star begin to rise back up in the sky. I found myself saying, "Wait a minute, that's not supposed to happen.  That's not a shooting star afterall."   The object was glowing red and green and was hard to identify the shape.  Instead of dissipating into the atmosphere after it fell, it began to move close to the ground next to a few tall buildings (5 - 10 stories in height).  It then moved back up in a jig jagged way.  It went about 5 stories above the taller buildings and then swooped back down near the ground again. We all looked away as we joked at what it could be.  "Hopefully it's just a very nicely made remote control toy or something."  But then I realized it had impressively bright lights.  We all looked back a third time to see if it was still there, and found it was very high up in the sky - about as high or even higher than a commercial airplane flies.

records.summary: Light in dissolving smoke plume.
records.story: Light in dissolving smoke plume. ON MARCH 2 2011 ON MY WAY TO WORK AT APPROXIMATELY 0540 I SAW A LARGE PLUME OF WHITE SMOKE ON THE HORIZON, I AM IN THE MILITARY THEREFOR I CANNOT RELEASE MY NAME BUT THE SIGHTING OCCURRED ON EAST MIRAMAR IN SAN DIEGO CALIFORNIA. THE WHITE PLUME SEEMED LIKE A FIRE SMOKE PLUME ONLY NEATER, THEN MY MIND GOT QUICKLY CHANGED WHEN I SAW A SMALL BALL OF LIGHT COME UP FROM BEHIND THE MOUNTAIN AND UP THROUGH THE PLUME. THE "SMOKE" THEN BEGAN TO FOLLOW THE LIGHT AS IT GREW LARGER AND BEGAN COMING TOWARD ME AND LOOKED AS IF IT STARTED TO SPIRAL. IN AN INSTANT THE LIGHT COMPLETELY DISAPPEARED AND THE SMOKE SEEMED TO DISSOLVE QUICKLY, AS IN A MATTER OF ABOUT 5 SECONDS. LEADING ME TO BELIEVE THAT IT WAS DEFINITELY NOT SMOKE. AND I WASN'T SEEING ANYTHING OF THIS EARTH. WHAT WAS AS STRANGE WAS THAT THE RADIO THAT I WAS LISTENING TO, WENT BLANK AND ALL I HEARD WAS STATIC, I EVEN CHANGED THE STATION A COUPLE OF TIMES AND ALL OF THEM WERE STATIC. A COUPLE OF GUYS FROM WORK ALS! O TOLD ME THAT THEIR RADIO STATIONS WENT OUT FOR ABOUT 2 MINUTES.

records.summary: lights over san diego tijuana border
records.story: lights over san diego tijuana border I had just gotten home about 21:40 sunday feb.20 . i had a few words with my brother. and i got a little angry and decided  i was going to jump in m truck n just drive off for a while. I got my keys n walked out the door towards my truck and immeiately noticed strange lights in the sky.i then just forgot about being angry and called my brother to come out to see the lights that seemed to be coming in our direction. When i first saw the lights there were three one seemed to be inthe front followed by two in close proximity to each other. As my brother was coming out of the house the leading light seemed to turn towards the south and seemed to fade at the same time and just disapeard. but as it started to turn and fade a fourth light appeared just to the left of the second and third lights my brother saw three lights but not the first one. they allseemed to follow each other in a slow movement. To me ithink they may have looked like some kind of flair. also the direction they were at was towards the otay airpot / "brown field" , but having lived here most of my life i know planes ddont fly in that pattern or altitude. the lights were a yellowish to amber in color and they just disappeared. My brother snaped a couple of shots blindly with his digital photo camera he could not  see anything on the screen as he aimed so i told him to just snap as he pointed towards the lights.

records.summary: Metallic round object hovering above the air show
records.story: Metallic round object hovering above the air show I was on the G street pier watching the air show when a round metallic object caught my eye.  It seemed too high up to be a helicopter, as several helicopters were holding a perimeter for the show.  (Maybe 30,000 feet?)   It did not move, just hovered, stationary, in one spot.  Just as I pointed it out to my friend and asked, "What the hell is that?"  It pulsed and shot upward quickly disappearing.  He missed it and told me it was probably a plane.  I kept looking to the sky after that trying to figure out what had just happened.  Several planes went by later at the same altitude, but looked nothing like what I had seen.  It definitely wasn’t a plane.

records.summary: A black object with strobing red/orange lights seen over San Diego.
records.story: A black object with strobing red/orange lights seen over San Diego. We heard our neighbors yelling outside.  My daughter and I went out to see what the commotion was.  Our two neighbors and the mailman were watching an object in the sky that was unidentifiable.  My daughter and I finally sighted it and the 5 of us watched it for approximately 3 minutes.  It was very high in the sky and was black.  We noted one light, then the light became a series of lights strobing apparently around the object.  The lights were a red/orange color.  A jet coming into Lindburgh field flew beneath it.  The object was coming in from the south-west heading into an easterly direction.  It made a course correction to a northerly direction.  The last we saw of it, it appeared to be starting to go to the east once again.  It appeared to be getting lower in the sky and going faster.

records.summary: June 26 San Diego north county 5 lights
records.story: June 26 San Diego north county 5 lights Today I was flying my RC airplane.  I was looking straight up and saw 5 objects moving from SSE to NW at a relatively constant pace. Two of the objects appeared to have changed color from reflective metallic silver to blue, like a hot flame color. They disappeared one by one but not in order. They were at a very high altitude.  I took photographs.

records.summary: UFO sphere chrome type in Otay Lakes in Eastlake San Diego
records.story: UFO sphere chrome type in Otay Lakes in Eastlake San Diego UFO had the shape of a sphere, it didn’t move for about 20 minutes and there were no sound or lights, it had a chrome color very bright.  It was visible very high over the clouds in lower Otay Lakes near the Arco training center.  I have a Video of the object.

records.summary: Flying, dripping red-orange globs over San Diego
records.story: flying, dripping red-orange globs over San Diego Looked up at sky approx 11pm Tues evening - may be off an hour - and saw what appeared to be a bright red-orange airplane light low in SW sky, moving slowly as if it was a small plane.  No detail, just a light.  Really impressed me as a plane, as plenty of small aircraft fly over my area near Montgomery Field.  As it got closer it got bigger - no sound, and it was moving in a straight line.  Then it started slowly dripping small globs of red-orange light straight down (in direction of ground).  This continued for about a minute, then with the final "drip" the thing was extinguished itself and disappeared.  By that time it had moved from SW to W sky.  Strangely, this was the second time I'd seen this happen: about a year ago, an identical thing took place around 2am high in sky moving from S to N...that time it did not extinguish itself, but kept moving, got smaller, and finally disappeared into the N sky..plenty of "drips" that time, too.

records.summary: Two beautiful color changing light spheres danced thru the sky.
records.story: Two beautiful color changing light spheres danced thru the sky. While driving from the beach on hiway 8, headed east,  I noticed what first looked like a shooting star, but kept going on to change from bright whitish to a beautiful lavendar shade. Next a second bright light appeared. The two sphere shaped glowing lites began to "dance" with eachother in the sky (not very high up.)  They swirled around almost like in crazy eight patterns.  They continuously changed colors from lavendar, to blue, to pink, as if going thru the whole color spectrum. After a few minutes of this dancing motion, one at a time they shot off in an arc into the distance and disappeared from my sight.

records.summary: "Cloud" shape moving south, no lights,sound or exhaust at about 16:00
records.story: "Cloud" shape moving south, no lights,sound or exhaust at about 16:00 While looking towards the eastern horizon I observed what appeared to be a "cloud" begin to travel at a very high rate of speed. Before I could react, this "cloud" had disappeared into a much larger cloud bank. i would estimate the distance between myself and the cloud bank to be approximately 6 to 8 miles away. I heard no sound and saw no lights or exhaust.  Wind conditions, at least on the ground, were dead calm.  I should mention that I live about 5 miles from Miramar MCAS.  I have never seen any cloud before or since behave in this manner. I would be very interested to know if anyone else has seen anything similar. ((NUFORC Note:  Source indicates that the date indicated above is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: 3 strange lights with no object insight but traveled from the north to the east disappearing!
records.story: 3 strange lights with no object in sight but traveled from the north to the east disappearing! I was walking home from 7-11 in north park tonight and when I was on Arizona and University it was 8:29pm,  I looked up in the sky & I saw 3 strange lights, yards apart.  It was not any airplanes or helicopter   There was no noise.  The lights I saw were only a few yards apart about 50 yards approximately, they went only in one direction to the east but came from the north and then I hurried up the hill I was walking on because there were some trees in my way in view of the lights so when I got to the top of the hill I saw the last light drift off into the east but also disapperead and tonight is thanksgiving.The weather was clear no clouds, no rain nothing.   I will admit I have never seen this before.  The lights just disappearing into thin air..  I cant explain anymore.

records.summary: I did not see it.  It appeared in photos I took from my iphone.
records.story: I did not see it.  It appeared in photos I took from my iphone. After noticing it, I took several more.  It was there and was  in different spots in every picture. I didn't know it was there. I couldn't see it. I was taking  pictures of the sunset.   I already sent an email with the pictures  to the site director under contacting. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: 3 bright(star-like), orange fireballs with white swirly tails.
records.story: 3 bright(star-like), orange fireballs with white swirly tails. 3 bright (star-like), orange fireballs with white swirly tails (exhaust) at high altitude. 2 grouped together heading SW. 1 lone fireball heading South. Speed: slower than commercial aircraft.

records.summary: Fast moving orange light over San Diego.
records.story: Fast moving orange light over San Diego. Extremely fast light flying just over the lowest rain clouds sometime between 10:05 and 10:10 pm, Thursday October 6 in San Diego, California.  This light was traveling from south to north.  The light was not white.  It was very bright, somewhere between the colors orange and red.  It was larger than any star in the sky; maybe 3 times the size of the largest star you see.  Of course it could be a meteor; but I do not think so.  It did not look like any meteor I have ever seen.  I have seen a lot of meteor showers.  It seemed like it was flying level and just over the lowest cloud layer.  No sound. There is not much to this sighting.  It only lasted a couple of seconds.  If you extend your arms at full length, just over one and a half feet apart----the light traveled that much space in the sky in less than 2 seconds.  If you consider straight up as 90 degrees, then the light was traveling at about 70 degrees south to north.  I was standing near the corner of Washington Street and Front Street here in San Diego.  Front Street runs north and south, so I knew the direction the light traveled. I did not have my watch with me to get the exact time, but the sighting was between 10:05 and 10:10 pm, Thursday October 6. It had rained earlier in the day; so there were patches of clear sky and low patches of rain clouds.   The light was not seen further north because the clouds blocked the view further north. This area has a lot of jet traffic for the San Diego airport.  This light was traveling at least 5 times faster than any jets in this area.   And again, no sound and the light was nothing like a meteor in my opinion.  The light seemed self contained and traveling flat just over the lowest clouds. ((NUFORC Note:  One of two similar sighting reports from the same source.  Other sighting was over Carlsbad, CA,  at 22:20 hrs. on Thursday, October 01, 2011.  Source of report describes himself, suggesting that he has scientific training in his background.  PD))

records.summary: UFO sighted over Mission Valley.
records.story: UFO sighted over Mission Valley. I was going on Interstate 8 East in the Mission Valley area of San Diego when I saw an oddly shaped aircraft.  It was black It was hovering over the Grantville area of San Diego. I got off the freeway and pulled into a parking lot.  I paid closer attention to the object. It was going too slow to be a plane and too large to be a helicopter.   might have been two of them.  It slowly moved westward towards the beach.  I left before I could see it go any further.

records.summary: I looked up into the dark night sky and a bright orb, like the same spotted over Jerusalem recently.  ((Student report.))
records.story: I was walking my dog while smoking,  I looked up into the dark night sky and a bright orb, like the same spotted over Jerusalem recently, made a "J" shaped movement and then disappeared.   My mind is blown, I'm kind of in denial but I know I saw what I saw. ((NUFORC Note:  Student report.  Possible hoax, we believe.  PD))

records.summary: Star-Like UFO Flying Over S. CA (night)
records.story: Star-Like UFO Flying Over S. CA (night) Saw star-like object flying at nine O'clock.  Slowly disappeared after flying west to east for about 1 full minute.   One other witness with me at the time. ((NUFORC Note:  Interestingly, the witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  ISS was visible at 22:16 hrs. on this date.  PD))

records.summary: 2 Star-like UFO's Flying over San Diego at the same time.
records.story: 2 Star-like UFO's Flying over San Diego at the same time. Saw star-like objects flying different directions.  Same in size.  Sighting was a 11:14pm.  Slowly disappeared after flying west to east for about 45 seconds.  One other witness with me at the time.

records.summary: Phone camera catches a square or triangle shaped craft accidentally from a moving vehicle near Miramar, San Diego.
records.story: Phone camera catches a square or triangle shaped craft accidentally from a moving vehicle near Miramar, San Diego. We were driving South on I-15 and my son was checking out my new phone, taking pictures out the back window of the car.  He captured this craft accidentally, and said "Hey mom there's a light in this one."  He and I both hurried and looked back, but didn't see anything.  The camera caught it though. ((NUFORC Note:  The object is anomalous, but could be the reflection from the inside surface of the automobile window the photo was taken through.  PD))

records.summary: Yellow-orange light seen 30 seconds and then it powered down and disappeared completly and then powered back on.
records.story: Yellow-orange light seen 30 seconds and then it powered down and disappeared completly and then powered back on. Last night, Monday August 27 at 8:25 pm I had a sighting here in San Diego, California.  I was about 2 miles southeast of the intersection of Interstate freeways 5 and 8.  This sighting started out with a solid yellow-orange light coming towards me from the north towards the south.  I was looking north.  There were no collision lights like a normal plane or jet would have.  Many jets and planes are seen down here as this area is along the landing path for the San Diego airport.  Jets that are flying south will head south along the 5 freeway and then turn east over the 8 freeway in preparation of landing at the San Diego airport.  I am very familiar with seeing these jets and planes.  And these aircraft have collision lights, and in this sighting, there were no collision lights on this yellow-orange light.  Anyway, this yellow-orange light was moving slowing towards me.  It was almost as large as the front light seen on an approaching jet, which is larger tha! n a star in the sky.  After viewing this Yellow-orange light for about 30 seconds, it slowing turned off.  Nothing.  I kept watching the area where the light had disappeared and about 2 minutes later, but much higher in the sky, the light, or a light, powered back on and quickly flew west to east.  This time, the light was mostly white, but looked a duller color than the stars.  It was not moving slowly, but faster than a jet would move at that higher elevation.  I lost track of it after about 30 seconds as it was too far away.  Then about 15 to 20 minutes later, maybe about 8:45pm, I saw a white light power-up directly north of me again; but this time lower than the first 2 lights described above.  This last time the light was as low as the jets coming in for their landing descent.  The light was not directly in the jets path, but somewhat more north.  It was slowing moving south to north and slow.  I did not see this last light very long, maybe 15 seconds and then it slow! ly turned off or powered down.  I say powered down, because th! at's the impression I got when I saw it turn off.  Again, no collision lights.  It was just gone.  I don't know if this was 1 craft or 2 or 3 separate crafts.  I did not hear any noise.  I should have heard something, at least for the last light since it was closer, but I did not.

records.summary: Point Loma,Ca, Daughter and I was standing on our balcony, when a white object appeared out over ocean. We first thought it was a helic
records.story: Point Loma,Ca, Daughter and I was standing on our balcony, when a white object appeared out over ocean. We first thought it was a helicopter, but it stayed in one spot. We watched it, and it seemed to be watching us. Someone knocked on our door,  I turned to door, turned back to object. Then it suddenly moved quickly to right, then sharply turned to left and disappeared out over ocean. It seems that SanDiego, and especially, Point Loma was very active at that time. Some of my tennants were walking the next evening, and said a bright light was following,and they said that they ran back to apartment , and it stopped at the door when they entered the building.  They did not know of our experience the afternoon before. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: I saw a ginormous, rectangular, metallic UFO in broad day light over the naval base.
records.story: I saw a ginormous, rectangular, metallic UFO in broad day light over the naval base. It was a warm, sunny, and windy day on the bay in San Diego.  I was about 8 to 12 years old and my neighbor was 2 years my senior.  His father took us fishing at Shelter Island Pier which faces North Island Naval Complex to the southeast(according to google maps).  The pier was wooden at the time and has since been rebuilt but is more or less in the same spot perpendicular then parallel to its shoreline in a 'T'. I am unsure of the exact time of day, it was likely between 11am and 2pm.  I am unsure of the month but the time of year was likely spring or summer because of how high and bright the sun was that day.  This could have been a Saturday afternoon, spring break or summer vacation.  The year was anywhere from 1989 to 1993. I believe my friend's dad noticed the UFO first, to the north.  We were on the south end of the pier looking north to our left.  It was gray/ dull-metallic in color and looked like a flying cruise ship with no protrusions of any kind.  It was flat and thick as if many levels to it, but was rectangular.  It appeared to have ports on its side or perhaps markings.  The craft was so high up that finer details  of its side were blurry and I had 20/20 vision all through school-age.  It had no lights visible and made no noise which I remember finding strange, so I remembered the whole incident fairly well. I think the craft was in excess of 200yards long and thousands of feet high in altitude. If i hold my thumb up out in front of me, the craft appeared about 1-1.5inches wide by about 2/8 to 3/8inches thick and atleast 45 degrees above horizon. It moved very slowly for approximately 15 minutes, traveling north to south from our vantage point. It seemed to be high above North Island and Coronado.   In relation to all the other planes and blimps that were nearby at lower altitudes made the size of this "craft" very large and very high.  At the time many of these facts were pointed out by my friends dad, whom seemed to be astonished and in disbelief.   I knew both my neighbor and his father to be intelligent people and I have a background in science and medicine.  We discussed how incredibly awkward the craft was for about an hour with other fisherman after we lost sight of it.  It was fairly unspectacular because of its super slow speed and dull color.  It didn't seem to spin or turn or deviate from its southern route.  Someone speculated it could have held as many people as Star Trek's Enterprise-D if it were real.  We passed it off as a military craft because it was so visible to everyone, it didn't move erratically, it was in close proximity to the naval base, and it disappeared just as silently as it appeared.   To my knowledge no one has reported on this "mother ship" sighting. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Bright orange flickering orb in sky
records.story: Bright orange flickering orb in sky A flickering yellow/orange orb that slowly tapered out and we could see the outline of a sphere and we thought it might have been a weather balloon but it was to small.   Also saw exact same object night before moving in other location.

records.summary: Moving fireball in the night sky, changed course and color multiple time at rapid speed in San Diego
records.story: Moving fireball in the night sky, changed course and color multiple time at rapid speed in San Diego While sitting down outside of my home facing the Western horizon, I witnessed a bright orange fireball in the sky moving from West to East.  Suddenly it abruptly changed directions, then moving South-West.   The color changed as well, from a bright orange fireball to a reddish hue, then from reddish hue to amber color.  Directions changed once again, from South-West to North, gaining both altitude and speed. While heading North at a rapid unnatural pace, it was no longer a simple fireball, but some sort of solid object or craft.  This all occurred in complete silence within a 3 minute time span between 8:55-9:05 Pacific Time.

records.summary: 3 white lights with no collision lights heading north from San Diego within a 12 minute period
records.story: 3 white lights with no collision lights heading north from San Diego within a 12 minute period On Tuesday October 9, I saw 3 separate lights or crafts in the evening sky here in San Diego, California which did not have collision lights. I was viewing this sighting from about one mile north of the San Diego International airport. There were considerable clouds at that time; so I could only see about 30 percent of the sky.  The clouds were broken and irregularly spaced. The first sighting was at 7:35pm and it was of a single light.  The second sighting was only 12 minutes later at 7:47pm and it contained 2 lights or crafts.  The second, or later sighting, was much closer and was at the same level as the low clouds.  These 2 lights or crafts had just passed over my house, or I assume they had passed over my house; but anyway, they were already a little north and a little east of my house, almost overhead and traveling NNE.  These 2 crafts were close to each other. If I stuck my hand out in front of me, 3 fingers would represent the distance between the crafts! .  One craft or light was ahead of the other one and it was brighter.  They were traveling faster than the jets do in this area. I saw them for 10 seconds before they went into the clouds.  They were traveling NNE, which would make them cross the normal jet traffic which goes west to east before turning around to come back to the San Diego Airport to land. I did not see any commercial aircraft in the area during this second sighting. The first sighting was a single light almost overhead, but a little east. This light or craft was very high. It could have been mistaken for a satellite, but it was not a satellite. It was traveling too fast to be a satellite. I saw this sighting for about 10 seconds also before it was hidden by cloud cover. I did not hear any noise from any of the crafts. I should have heard noise from the second sighting since they was so close; almost directly overhead when I first saw them.

records.summary: Single white light or craft passed over and very close to a commercial jet.  ((NUFORC Note:  Possibly the ISS?  PD))
records.story: Single white light or craft passed over and very close to a commercial jet On Wednesday October 10, from 6:56 pm to 7:00 pm, or 4 minutes, I watched a single light cross the early evening sky here in San Diego, California.  I was viewing this sighting from about one mile north of the San Diego International airport. There were some clouds, but I still could see about 70 percent of the sky.  This single white or slightly blue-white light was traveling slowly SW to NE; slower than the commercial jet.  I first saw this single light south of me and it flew almost directly overhead, but slightly east of me and then continued in a straight line NE till I could not see it any longer. It was traveling just above the lowest fluffy clouds.  After it passed me, while heading NE, it went just above a small cloud at the same time that a commercial jet which was traveling through the same cloud. The jet was flying west to east preparing to turn around east of the San Diego Airport and then land. They were not very far apart; but I don't know how far! apart.  They basically were in the same cloud. I could easily see the front white light of the commercial jet as well as the wing lights and collision lights before it went into the cloud.  The single light had no collision lights.  At this time of night, the sky was not black, but a blue black. Not only could I see the lights on the commercial jet, but I could still see the outline of the wings, the body of the jet and the tail section.  The single light did not have any wings or anything visible other than the light itself. I am sure I would have been able to see wings if this single light or craft had wings.  The single light was less than a quarter the size as the outline of the jet.  Again, the single light or craft passed just above the cloud and the commercial jet went through the cloud.  They crossed paths at that time. I did see both crafts continue on their paths after they crossed.  The single light or craft made no noise. I could hear the jet.  The single light was clos! er to me than the jet.

records.summary: Group of Orbs seen over Pershing and 5 south Exit in San Diego
records.story: Group of Orbs seen over Pershing and 5 south Exit in San Diego On August 3rd, 2012 at 9:09:28 I filmed a minute and half long video of about 8 floating orbs.  I first spotted about 20 of them from my car as I was exiting  Pershing and the 5 south (San Diego, CA).   Once I got out, though, I could only see about 8 of them.   In my video they are small but in person they were much more bright and had a larger presence in the sky.  They were hovering in groups and then disappeared. Here is a link to the film footage I took. Hope this works. Please excuse the commentary. https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?v=10151366486088504

records.summary: Big laser like neon=purple light shoot out of horzion.
records.story: Big laser like neon=purple light shoot out of horzion. On the night of mid- March 2012, I was walking home from the local store right after sunset. I live near the Mexican border in San Diego and I was facing south towards the horizon listening to my iPod when I notice a big green jolt of light shoot out of the horizon. It reminded me of something you see in Star Wars, the light changed from green to blue to purple, spreading across the night sky in a window shield wipe effect. I was so taken back from what I’ve saw, I stopped and looked around in the parking lot I was in and no one was there.  I saw a woman in a parked car and ask if she seen anything strange, but her back was facing from what I seen. She laughed and I laughed too (out of nervousness). I was still stunned from what I seen and trying to understand what I saw that lasted 5 seconds. As I was walking out of the parking lot and I saw two women who I passed by earlier while I was walking to the store. I asked if they so that light in the sky. They said they saw it also, I can tell they were scared and confused. We spoke for about 5 minutes trying to understand what we saw.  I went home still in disbelief. I know this wasn’t just some earthly phenomenon, something in my heart tells me it was something I will never understand. I tweeted what I saw asked if anyone in my city seen it. I got a response from some who lives about maybe 5 miles from where I saw it and she seen it too. I checked for the local news that night and no mentions and nothing from the Mexican news. The next few days I checked online and couldn’t find any reports. I tried to do some research of what I saw, but also couldn’t find anything close to what I saw that night. It’s something I will always remember and these typed letters cant justified what I saw. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Orb Type Lights Seen Near Balboa Park In San Diego
records.story: Orb Type Lights Seen Near Balboa Park In San Diego It was Friday night August 3rd at 9:10 P.M. I along with four other friends in a car were driving along the 5 south exit and Pershing in San Diego California when we saw a bunch of cars pulled to the side of the road.    Seeing the cars pulled to the side we decided to pull off to the side as well and when we got out of the car we noticed about 40-50 people standing around looking at the sky.  Looking up we could see approximately 20 that my friend next to me pointed out of what looked to be orb type objects in the sky.  This was in the area where the planes fly for Lindburgh field the airport as we heard a big airplane fly thru.  They made a formation and looked to be hovering in groups as they were really close to each other, than a couple minutes later they were gone.

records.summary: Dancing lights that would fly around and then merge into one light
records.story: Dancing lights that would fly around and then merge into one light We went to Morely Field in Balboa Park in San Diego to walk our dog at night between 10:30 and 11:00 pm. There are very few people in the park at that time because they close the parking lot and you need to park on a side street and walk into the park.  It was a cool damp misty sort of night with clouds and lots of layers of atmosphere.  We saw these dancing lights in the sky and at first tried to explain it--maybe strobe lights or reflections of some kind but nothing made sense.  The lights would start from one source, then spread out and dance around and then return to the source light. The whole sky had a different quality to it, almost like a magnetic type of storm.  This went on for 5-10 minutes, then the lights returned to their source point. I could still see where they were, it was a slight glow in the clouds, but they stayed there and stopped dancing. I had the feeling it knew we were watching.  The source light was still there when we left the park.  We ! have been back to the park several times since, but have not encountered those conditions or seen the lights again.

records.summary: Small circle flying low over house in Encinitas, CA with flashing lights
records.story: small circle flying low over house in Encinitas, CA with flashing lights On Thursday, October 18, 2012 at 1 AM Pacific time I sighted a UFO in the sky hovering over a house in Encinitas, California, USA on Vulcan Ave just north of The Self Realization Fellowship.  I then turned left onto a side street where I recorded a short video on my phone.  Then I turned around and continued on Vulcan, north towards the object, where I stopped in the street and recorded it some more till a car was coming.  Next, I made a left turn into the train and bus parking lot where I tried recording from my car but the street lights prevented it from showing up on video. I sat and watched it hover over the home for about 5 minutes until it started to fly/hover in the direction that I was parked. This frightened me and I exited the parking lot on a side street where it then met the 101 coast highway where I turned left and looked up to try and find it while driving. I couldn't see it. I drove for about 5 minutes and then returned to the area where it was a! nd could not see it. I checked 30 minutes later to see if there was any trace of it and there wasn't.

records.summary: Fast Moving Bright Ball Hangs Over Mission Bay San Diego
records.story: Fast Moving Bright Ball Hangs Over Mission Bay San Diego At approximately 21:40 local time on 09AUG2012 my girlfriend and I were positioned on the northern shore of Mission Bay, San Diego when we noticed an object in the sky.  As we faced south we could see the object which appeared at first to be a very bright star.  My girlfriend pointed it out to me and asked if it was a star.  It became apparent that it was not. As we watched the object would move to the west in short but rapidly accelerated bursts.  The object would then rapidly change course and head to the north or several times appearing to reverse direction or wobble side to side but in a very rapid fashion.  We observed the object doing these short bursts and also observed it stand completely still.  The object would also intensify and dim in brightness but this did not seem to be related to any type of cloud cover or change in distance.  It also did not change intensity in light on any type of timed interval. After 30 minutes a fireworks display shot off by Sea World had concluded and the object seemed to remain stationary at this point.  It should be noted that when the fireworks started the object also paused for a period of several minutes then resumed its irregular flight maneuvers. I spent 8 years in the United States military during which time I was in a flight unit with fixed wing aircraft and helicopters.  I can say that this craft moved in ways I have never seen military or commercial aircraft move.

records.summary: I was watching a movie on disk and took a break to go outside to have a smoke. I have to where glasses to watch movies (distance) and k
records.story: I was watching a movie on disk and took a break to go outside to have a smoke.  I have to where glasses to watch movies (distance) and keep them on when I go outside to look at stars while I smoke. I was looking up in the sky and saw a bird soaring across the sky from west to east and my first thought was “wow” a hawk or eagle.  As it moved across the sky I started to realize it was different.  It wasn’t until it disappeared into the eastern horizon that I realized the following facts of what I just watched.  The bird, it had a perfect shape wings spread and all, appeared to light, not glow, just like the stars. It sailed across the sky without flapping its wings and the time it took from the moment I saw it, the upper west region of the sky, to the time it disappeared in the western side of the sky, not fully the lower horizon, could not be traversed by a bird.  And there was no wing flap, it was a perfect image of a large bird of pray moving across they sky wit! hout change. I have seen “stars” moving across the sky on these same types of moments when I step out for a smoke. I have seen what could be satellites, or some other space junk.  I have seen what are obviously are planes with the flashing lights and all. But I have never seen this.  It was a fully formed bird with wings spread, soaring across the sky without a single flap of the wings, at a height far above what a bird would soar, and a steady light, exactly like the stars. I have watched many a hawk, and even a couple of eagles, soar around the sky’s and when this was over I realized I had not seen either no mater how much it had the shape.

records.story: UFO sighting over Ocean Beach, CA on 11 AUG 2012 At approximately 2230 PST I looked out the kitchen window and saw 6 to 10 bright flying objects flying North to South at a high altitude (approximately 10,000 ft AGL).   I called my wife and we both went outside.  I filmed the event with my iphone 4 and my wife filmed with her flip video.  The UFO’s were flying in a linear motion.  When they reached a point they each disappeared individually.   This was truly an amazing event to witness and has changed my beliefs about the existence of UFO’s.  I am a pilot with more than 4000 flight hours and have never seen anything like this before.  Also, I have posted the video on my You Tube account.

records.summary: 40 bright objects, yellow/red lights, rose one at a time from the horizon over La Jolla, California.
records.story: 40 bright objects, yellow/red lights, rose one at a time from the horizon over La Jolla, California. (Facing north from Mission Bay, San Diego) 40 bright objects, yellow/red lights, rose one at a time from the horizon over La Jolla, California, from about 8:00 PM to 8:20 PM on Sunday, April 22, 2012.  The objects moved slowly to the west for 1 to 3 miles, in generally the same direction, disappearing into the overcast at around 1000 feet.  Each object was visible for approximately 15 to 90 seconds, and flew at random speeds, but all heading up and to the west.  Many of the objects appeared to fly in loose formations of two or three, for at least a portion of the time.  One observer said they were pretty.  Two other observers said they were not aircraft but UFOs after only a few seconds of observation.

records.summary: Black sphere over San Diego airport flying against the wind north to south.
records.story: Black sphere over San Diego airport flying against the wind north to south Yesterday, onn Saturday September 22 at about 4:45pm (give or take 5 minutes), I had a sighting here in San Diego, California.   I was viewing this sighting from about 2 miles southeast of the intersection of Interstate freeways 5 and 8 in the community called Mission Hills.  Most of the sky was covered in tropical clouds; but there was one large section south and southeast of me which was mostly open blue sky (just a few small clouds).  This open area would be over the San Diego airport.  The clouds were moving southwest to northeast pretty fast.  I saw one round black object that was moving against the wind from north to south towards the San Diego airport.  This black object was not moving fast, but was clearly moving against the wind.  When I saw this object, it was not directly over me, but already southeast of me.  The black object was round and it appeared as a sphere.  At the time of the sighting, I could not tell how big it was; other than it was lar! ger than a weather balloon, but smaller than a commercial jet.  It was just below the few clouds that were in the open area.  These clouds were dipping a little, like it was raining up in the clouds, but the water was not hitting the ground.  The black object was traveling below the main part of the small clouds, but through the wispy part of the clouds that were dipping down.  This object, if it was a balloon or a floating object, would have been traveling with the clouds; but there was no doubt, none, the object was moving north to south against the wind.  This object was did not look like a disc, but more like it was round or a sphere.  I saw it for about one minute.  This object was round and black.  The black color did not reflect or shimmer; but maybe it was rotating.  I did not see it rotate, but there was a rhythmic change from solid black to something other than black.  It would be solid black most of the time, and then a reflective shimmer for a short time.  It was not like the reflective shimmer you see when there is an aluminum balloon floating by.  There are no words for it, but maybe half-way between simi-transparent and the aluminum reflective shimmer of a balloon.  I don’t know if that makes sense; but the object was a solid black round object for most of the time, but then for a short few seconds, it would almost become transparent.  And then back to black, a very solid black.  I should have timed the rhythmic change; but I did not think of doing that during the sighting.  There were no lights on this object and it did not make any sound.  After a minute, it was too far away to see.  I did not have a camera with me.  I had that sighting yesterday afternoon in full sunlight.  I was not able to judge the size of the craft; but this morning, Sunday morning, a military transport jet flew by the same location at the same elevation, just below the clouds.  So now, since I just saw a jet about in the same location, the black object I saw yesterday would be the size of the tail wing section; but of course, filled in as a sphere. ((NOTE FROM VISITOR TO THE NUFORC WEBSITE)) Anyway it may be minor but I found one suspicious report in my own neighborhood or perhaps the reporter was just confused. San Diego, 9/22/2012 16:45.  Witness twice stated that the object that they witnessed  was "South and Southeast" of their location (In Mission Hills.) "over the San Diego Airport" ( Lindbergh Field?). That airport is SOUTHWEST of Mission Hills. Of course this could be a typo. They stated that the wind was from the southeast to general North, the exact opposite of the norm in this area but not unheard of. They further stated that this was one reason they were awed as the craft flew against the wind ( Eliminating balloons.). Well if the wind direction they described was accurate then aircraft landing at Lindbergh Field would in fact be landing in the direction of the craft sited. As this is unusual, likely the witness has rarely if ever seen aircraft in this pattern and mistook a final approach for an unknown object. I also note that the time, 16:45 is prime landing time at Lindbergh. ((END))

records.story: Seemed to have random courses and altitudes; as if piloted. Some had camera phones (not I). 12.11.2012 - San Diego Area 9:00 P.M - 10:45 P.M.\P.S.T. White, blue, orange, yellow - some bright - some less so.  Seemingly roundish, orb shaped. Moving at different rates of speed appearing from horizon to near  or opposite horizon.  Or upward and out of sight.No sound. Like pilots having some fun!\ Probably 15 or more viewers strolling along Coast Highway 101.  People stopping and showing others (who see).  Probably 3 per minute into view for 15-20 seconds, each.

records.summary: A brilliant white perfect circle changes to a circle within a circle and then becomes a distant dot in the sky.
records.story: A brilliant white perfect circle changes to a circle within a circle and then becomes a distant dot in the sky On or about June 18, 1996 at 8:26AM, while travelling southbound on Interstate 15 (I-15) corridor in greater San Diego, California, and in the vicinity of formerly Naval Air Station, Mira Mar, and now the Marine Corps Air Station, Mira Mar, I saw in the southeastern morning sky a round circular object. At this time (1996), I lived in North County San Diego and worked for a private, not-for-profit, Institution of Higher Education (post-secondary), which was headquartered on and along Camino Del Rio South parallel to Interstate 8 (I-8). On regular work days, Monday-Friday, I commuted to and from work using I-15 corridor, and appropriate exits taking me to and away from my office location.  I had been using the I-15 corridor since 1991 and became familiar with smaller cities between my residence and place of work along the corridor. When approaching the vicinity of Mira Mar, my daily routine was to quickly scan the morning skies (while operating my vehicle), and look for Naval fighter jets in the skies practicing ‘touch-and-go’ maneuvers at the Air Station.  As memory serves, it was customary for the fighter jets, flight pattern, to circle and approach air strip from the east when landing or touching down. On the morning of June 18, I was scanning the morning skies but did not notice any ‘human’ craft in the air.  I assumed the Air Station had their jets down in hangers conducting maintenance on them.  I did however notice what appeared to be a brief glitter in the southeastern sky.  At first, I thought it might be the sun but the sun had already risen to higher elevation.  Then I thought it might be a commercial aircraft from San Diego International Airport at high altitude and the sun’s rays reflecting off the fuselage of the craft. It suddenly appeared in the southeastern morning sky.  The object was a perfect circle, brilliant white in color but blinding to the eyes.  Using my thumb as a gauge and extending my arm out in the direction of the object, it was larger than my thumbnail and perhaps the size of a 25 cent coin (quarter).  It didn’t move it hovered as if suspended in the air. I was driving approximately 65mph, keeping up with the traffic, and flailing my left arm out the window shaking my hand and pointing my fingers upward in the sky hoping other drivers would notice and see the object as well.  This is all taking place and happening within seconds, really.  I looking up briefly, driving, and trying to get others to look-up as well. The object changes!  What initially appeared as a brilliant white circle, suddenly changed and it became two circles or a circle within a circle.  The inner circle was white but it moved like gaseous steam, rolling over and over, and it was surrounded by an outer circle that was clear and translucent.  The space between the perimeter of the larger outer circle and the perimeter of the inner circle (the circle within a circle), was transparent and there was something like a heat wave that moved between the perimeters of the circles.  It reminded me of heat waves moving across a hot desert floor that can be seen from a distance. The object begins to move.  As quickly as the object appeared, hovered, changed, and reconstituted to its original state, it begins to move southwardly in the morning sky.  Within seconds what appeared to be an object the size of a quarter, moved and accelerated its speed and was now a mere white dot dancing in the distance. The sighting incident happened within seconds, and maybe slightly more than a minute?  I honestly do not know how much time elapsed.  I do recall looking at my clock radio when I first noticed the object and hence I report the incident occurring at 8:26AM. There is more … a very unusual dream that happened several days after experiencing the sighting but perhaps that is for a different posting.

records.story: From my perspective it looked like a long line with 4 red lights on top and 4 white lights on the bottom. The picture has not been altered in any way. ((NUFORC Note:  The source of the report is a very experienced photographer, who has her own website devoted to her high-quality photographs.  Hence, she is quite knowledgeable about photography.  Our opinion is that the lights are most like the strobes on an airliner, but the witness has stated that she did not see any aircraft in the sky, at the time she took the photograph. records.summary: UFO seen at Camp Pendleton, San Diego, CA.
records.story: UfO seen at Camp Pendleton, San Diego, CA My name is ((name deleted)), and I am a ((deleted--thirties)) year old ex-US Marine, honorably discharged. I entered the Marine Corp in 1997, and that is the year the event took place.  I heard about this on Coast to Coast, and they said to report any event no matter how much time has elapsed.  I was in boot camp at MCRD San Diego, and during my thirteen weeks there, there are several times that we were taken to Camp Pendleton.   On this particular occasion we made our way there, and had to hump (hike) a mountain by the name of Old Smokey.  Old Smokey is a mountain on Camp Pendleton that was particularly high and steep.  Three quarters of the way up you have to basically crawl up the mountain it is so steep.  I remember actually passing through the clouds on the way up the mountain it is so high.   At approximately 21:00 hours my company was getting ready to go to bed when a huge craft appeared right above us.  It was so close it seemed as though we could almost touch it.  It hovered above us as though it was looking right at us.   There was about 200 Marines looking at this enormous craft, including enlisted and officers.   After about ten mins, we heard our helicopters, and jets heading right for the craft.  When our jets came within a couple of feet, the craft sped off with speed that I have never seen before.   After it left I’ll never forget the beautiful blue like exhaust that floated in the air for about two hours.   The following day we were told by our commanding officer never to speak of what we saw.

records.summary: 2 white lights zig-zag over Qualcomm Stadium (Chargers vs Texans game) just before commercial break going it the 4th quarter
records.story: 2 white lights zig-zag over Qualcomm Stadium (Chargers vs Texans game) just before commercial break going it the 4th quarter National TV-UFO Sighting at Chargers vs Texans game 9-9 I have a DVR recording of the game played by the Chargers vs Texans on Thurs 9-9 around 9:51 pm PST.  If you watch the game just before going into the 4th quarter, right before the commercial break, the camera pans out to a view of the stadium and night sky. It seemed almost like it separated from the brighter object and went forward instead of right like the other did.

records.story: Three purple centrifugal ultraviolet round engines in a triangle formation pulsating centripetal burst of electric arcs.. I seen a large silver metallic craft that was very large, about the size of a small airfield that came over the horizon at a high rate of speed and came towards where I was standing.  The big thing upon getting closer to the shore split into three rounded triangles, all with three centrifugal ultraviolet round engines in a triangle formation which appeared to be inside the aforementioned rounded triangles of the former one which is now three large crafts.  There was a transformer like hum coming from the front rounded triangle ahead of the other two rounded triangles in a right triangle formation a possible flight mode to fool the local airport with illusory and then all three rounded triangles made a ninety degree turn and made a run for the border I assume due to the fact a Navy jet was deployed off a aircraft carried and then their was a brief game of cat and mouse and all at once the three crafts with three centrifugal lights that formed three rounded tria! ngles immerged  back into one and pulled away from the navy jet at a very high rate of speed headed South towards Mexico.  I have never seen nothing like it.  You could always see the purple glow of the three fan looking motors of all to one and then a streak that left the Navy jet at I'd say at least 3800 miles per hour.  The Navy jet goes around 1300 miles per hour and this irregular large grey silver metallic spaceship went so fast it was like it disappeared right before my eyes.  The moon was out and the city lights from San Diego made a aurora which caused the viewing in the dead of night.  Something big is getting ready to happen.

records.summary: 15 flying objects over San Diego.
records.story: 15 flying objects over San Diego. At approximately 21:30 on Thursday, 8 August 2013, during a five minute period, fifteen separate and distinct airborne objects with identical bright white lighting emerged at low altitude from southeast of downtown San Diego, flew in a gentle climb initially at a moderate rate of velocity, then began a near vertical climb until I lost sight.  They were in a very loose trail formation and maneuvered very differently from conventional commercial or military aircraft.  The lighting on the objects was constant and non-flickering.  There were no conventional red or white anti-collision lights apparent on any of the objects.  There were no red, green, or white navigation lights evident on any of the objects.  This was in stark contrast to commercial passenger airliners approaching San Diego's Lindbergh Field for landing.  The lighting and flight paths of the objects were in stark contrast to the commercial airliners that appeared to fly under the formation of the objects.  Military helicopter flight operations at NAS North Island were also ongoing simultaneously and were in stark visual contrast to the objects.  The objects did not make any sounds or noise. I am a retired Marine aviator with 4000 hours of flying experience.  What I witnessed last night was like nothing I had ever seen before.  There has been no reporting of any sightings, as I described, in any of the local San Diego media sources.  I can't imagine that no one else saw the same sight.  Close to where I was standing, four other people saw the objects and were commenting on the sighting.  I was able to take two photographs with my iPhone camera that clearly show multiple flying objects above the San Diego skyline. Can this sighting be verified?
